info.name: MyDoctor Platform - Complete API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for MyDoctor Platform backend with all endpoints organized by Admin, Doctor, and Patient panels

request.description: Login user and get JWT token
Get reviews for a doctor using query parameter (public)
Get available time slots for a doctor (public)
Check if a time slot is available (public)
Get route from patient to clinic (public)
Get doctors list with unread message counts for chat

item.name: Get Subscription Plan by ID (Admin Route)

request.description: Update any product (admin can update any product)
Delete any product (admin can delete any product)

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Platform Maintenance",
  "message": "System will be down on Jan 15",
  "announcementType": "BROADCAST",
  "priority": "IMPORTANT",
  "isPinned": true,
  "expiryType": "EXPIRE_AFTER_DATE",
  "expiryDate": "2024-01-20T00:00:00.000Z"
}

request.description: Get who has read the announcement
Add time slot to a specific day
Get available slots for a date (public)
Start conversation with patient (requires CONFIRMED appointment)
Start video session (requires CONFIRMED ONLINE appointment)
Get video session by appointment ID
Get doctor's notifications (replace :userId with actual user ID)
Create review for doctor (after completed appointment)
Get favorite doctors (replace :patientId with actual patient ID)
Remove favorite doctor (replace :id with favorite record ID)
Start video session (requires CONFIRMED ONLINE appointment)
Get video session by appointment ID
Get patient's notifications (replace :userId with actual user ID)
